name: Dreamcharmer
description:
Lowell is a dream alchemist, someone who can collect and use dreams akin to magic. Dark shadows have manifested on the streets of Victorian London and it’s up to him to discover the cause. Guided by the mysterious Sleepless Girl, will he be able to bring peace to the city overrun with Nightmares, or more difficult still, come to terms with his unsavory past? Gather dreams from the sleeping townspeople, combine them, and fight your way through this fast-paced 2D action-platformer!

Unique Selling Points

  • Attractive, textured visual style.
  • Collect and strategically mix dreams to power your attack!
  • 3 base dream types with 2 powerful combinations!
  • A cast of quirky enemies with strengths and weaknesses to exploit!
  • Interesting story to unfold as you play.
